Title: Crazy
Writer: Carlton Cuse (developed for television by), Kerry Ehrin (developed for television by), Anthony Cipriano (developed for television by), Steve Kornacki, Alyson Evans, Torrey Speer
Actors: Vera Farmiga, Freddie Highmore, Max Thieriot, Olivia Cooke
Plot: Norman spends the day with a surprise visitor; Norma attempts to keep secrets from being revealed.
